Query1.title: Is this Rishi Sunak dancing 'shirtless' at Ibiza club? Viral video sets ...

content.content:
[Content truncated]...' at Ibiza club? Viral video sets Internet on fire; has over 3.6 million views
====================================================================================================================
]
##### 
03:11 PM Nov 04, 2022 IST
*   ]
*   ]
*   ]
*   ](whatsapp://send?text=https://www.tribuneindia.com/news/diaspora/is-this-rishi-sunak-dancing-shirtless-at-ibiza-club-viral-video-sets-internet-on-fire-has-over-3-6-million-views-447534/IsthisRishiSunakdancing'shirtless'atIbizaclub?ViralvideosetsInternetonfire;hasover3.6millionviews)
  Follow us] Connect with us]
!
  !]
Advertisement
**Chandigarh, November 4**
An old video showing a Rishi Sunak lookalike dancing at a club has resurfaced on social media. It went viral in no time as soon as the 42-year-old was named the prime minister of the United Kingdom.
The video has been circulated with claims that it features Sunak, but here is a fact check.
A quick Google search says he is not Rishi Sunak. The man dancing has a striking resemblance to Rishi Sunak. In the video, he is seen holding a drink in his hand and is seen dancing at a club in Ibiza with other partygoers.
> 
> 
> — No Context Brits (@NoContextBrits) 
On Twitter, the video has garnered over 3.6 million views. The clip had earlier gone viral in January.
The video was shot at Wayne Lineker’s O Beach Ibiza club.
Wayne Lineker’s Instagram profile also reveals that the video was first uploaded in July 2019. Lineker is the owner of the O Beach Ibiza Club on the Spanish island.
> View this post on Instagram
> 
> 
Moreover, fact-checking website Boom Live did a further investigation of Sunak’s social media profiles and found no evidence that he had been in Ibiza in July 2019. Instead, the British leader had attended an event with North Yorkshire students on July 10 and a community event at July 15, 2019.
Rishi Sunak is the first Hindu Prime Minister of Indian origin in the UK.

Although it has a good track record, like all outlets, it can sometimes be subject to bias, which is important to consider in evaluating its overall credibility.

Relevance.Relevance Justification: This evidence clarifies that the man in the video is a lookalike and states the video's original posting timeline, thus debunking the claim that it features Sunak. It effectively determines that the claim is false and brings historical context.

Video of “Sunak” partying in the Balearics goes viral
=====================================================
Not what the new Prime Minister needs right now
-----------------------------------------------
Rishi Sunak lookalike cut shapes at Wayne Lineker's club in Ibiza. Rishi Sunak lookalike dancing at a beach club in Ibiza | **Youtube: 3W Daily**
Palma27/10/2022 14:37
Minutes after **Rishi Sunak** was confirmed as the new British prime minister, **a video showing a young man partying at a famous beach club in Sant Antoni, Ibiza, was picked up by several media outlets and has gone viral.**
>  Our new Prime Minister Rishi Sunak 😂 @britishmemes      
Months ago, the video was widely circulated and now it has been circulated again, with several media outlets suggesting that it was Sunak, 42, the youngest prime minister in the modern era.
##### Related news
]
#### 
**The resemblance is unmistakable but it is a ‘double’ of Sunak**. It is a young man who bears a striking resemblance to him.
The images accompanying this story were filmed at the **island’s Ocean Beach Club** and were initially posted on the TikTok profile of club owner **Wayne Lineker** with the caption “Rishi Sunak trying to win over an Ibiza crowd today and getting votes for his campaign”.

UK PM Rishi Sunak's 'Doppelganger' Spotted Partying At Ibiza Club, Leaving Internet Furious
===========================================================================================
An old video showing how a Rishi Sunak lookalike was seen partying in Ibiza is now going viral on the internet. The video was taken in July.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
]
Updated on Oct 26, 2022, 12:31 IST\- 3 min read
!
On Tuesday,  broke a lot of records and became the 57th Prime Minister of the United Kingdom. The man became the first Indian-origin prime minister of the UK, replacing his rival Liz Truss.
Rishi Sunak's Doppelganger parties in Ibiza
-------------------------------------------
However, now that Sunak has become a trending topic across the globe, people want to know more about him.
Recently, people have discovered that there is a lookalike of the newly appointed Prime Minister of the United Kingdom and he likes to party.
A video is surfacing online that shows the doppelganger of  dancing, drinking, and raging in Ibiza. Wayne Lineker, the owner of the O Beach Club in Ibiza, had shared a video of a clubgoer throwing shapes, tagging Sunak. "@rishisunakmp trying to win the Ibiza crowd over today campaigning for votes," he had written.
In the video, the lookalike can be seen looking at the camera and showing his moves with a drink in his hands.
Watch the video here:
---------------------
>

[Content truncated]... Sunak look-alike spotted partying at Ibiza Club
==============================================================================================
SECTIONS
'Raving Rishi' is an Internet sensation! Rishi Sunak look-alike spotted partying at Ibiza Club
ET OnlineLast Updated: Oct 27, 2022, 09:26:00 AM IST
Rate Story
Follow us]
Share
(javascript:// "facebook")(javascript:// "twitter")(javascript:// "linkedin")(javascript:// "whatsapp")(javascript:void\(0\) "Email this article")
Font Size
AbcSmall
AbcMedium
AbcLarge
Save
Comment
Synopsis
The unnamed guy is seen having the time of his life at a beach party.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
!Agencies
Fondly nicknamed as 'Raving Rishi' the unnamed man who bears a marked resemblance to the new PM of Britain, is seen having the time of his life at an Ibiza party. (Images:Instagram/waynelineker)
### Related
*   
*   
*   
‘Is that ?!’... Some netizens were amused at what seemed to be Britain’s 57th Prime Minister, dancing shirtless before a group of admirers at a beach party. The video quickly went viral on the Internet.  
 However, it turns out the man in the video is not the former UK Chancellor, but his doppelgänger. Ever since Sunak was declared as the new PM of Britain, many Indians all across the globe are in the mood for celebration. Netizens reacted to the momentous occasion with a bit of light-hearted fun. Memes on Sunak made the rounds on the internet, many of which focused on his resemblance to celebrities like former Team India cricketer Ashish Nehra and actor . As far as the carefree lookalike was concerned, the Twitterati named him ‘’.  
In the video, Sunak’s unnamed twin is seen shirtless, holding a glass in one hand and dancing with abandon as the crowd cheered him on. Tagging Sunak, the video was shared by Wayne Lineker, the owner of the O Beach Club in Ibiza, along with a caption, “@rishisunakmp trying to win the  crowd over today campaigning for votes.” The video was originally shared in July, but has resurfaced after Sunak made headlines as the first Indian-origin PM of Britain.  
> 
“This guy’s got too many moves to be ," one Instagram user commented. Another wrote, “Na as if Rishi is living it up at O Beach and I’m sitting writing emails."  
The ...[Content truncated]

website_quality_evaluation.justification: The Economic Times is a respected financial news publication, offering accurate information, though it focuses more on business news than on political issues.

Relevance.Relevance Justification: This source highlights that the person dancing is a lookalike of Rishi Sunak and not Sunak himself. It provides context about the reaction to the video and emphasizes its misleading nature, making it very relevant to the claim.

QA.Question: Does the video definitively identify the shirtless dancer as U.K. Prime Minister Rishi Sunak?
QA.Answer: The video does not definitively identify the shirtless dancer as U.K. Prime Minister Rishi Sunak. Key points to support this conclusion include: 1. **Lookalike Claims**: The video in question has been reported to involve a lookalike of Rishi Sunak, not the Prime Minister himself. A source from India Times describes the individual in the video as a "Rishi Sunak lookalike" who was seen partying in Ibiza, emphasizing that this video is not of Sunak, but rather of someone resembling him. 2. **Previous Debunking**: France 24 highlighted that misleading videos claiming to show Sunak dancing have circulated widely online, and similar claims have been debunked. They specifically mention the misleading nature of such videos, implying that there are instances where videos attributed to Sunak have turned out to involve other individuals. Based on the analysis of the evidence, there is a strong indication that the individual in the video is not Rishi Sunak but rather someone who closely resembles him.
